cards.title: Device has not rebooted in over 30 days, so the system needs a reboot for stability.
cards.explanation: This card indicates 'Device has not rebooted in over 30 days, so the system needs a reboot for stability.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

troubleshooting.overview: This card indicates 'Device has not rebooted in over 30 days, so the system needs a reboot for stability.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

scenarios.title: Potential Issue â€“ Time source or sync failure
steps: Query Windows Time status and configuration.
Resync and verify offset and Kerberos.

scripts.name: Reset time sync
scripts.code:
w32tm /query /status
w32tm /query /configuration
w32tm /config /syncfromflags:DOMHIER /update
net stop w32time
net start w32time
w32tm /resync /force
